localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: We use software that scrapes the Internet to figure out which stocks are being mentioned more often. We filter through the noise and dig deep into 2-3 stocks. A weekly report is delivered straight to your inbox every Wednesday 9am sharp (PST).
blogPost.body: We use software that scrapes the Internet to figure out which stocks are being mentioned more often. We filter through the noise and dig deep into 2-3 stocks. A weekly report is delivered straight to your inbox every Wednesday 9am sharp (PST).
blogPost.title: Ticker Nerd - Analysing hot stocks before the hype train arrives
blogPost.author: Pat Walls

localize.description: 我们用软件在互联网上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的频率较高。我们从噪音中过滤出来，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每周三上午9点整（太平洋标准时间），我们会将周报直接发送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列车到来前分析热点股

localize.description: 我們用軟件在互聯網上搜刮，找出哪些股票被提及的頻率較高。我們從噪音中過濾出來，深入挖掘2-3只股票。每週三上午9點整（太平洋標準時間），我們會將週報直接發送到您的收件箱。
localize.tagline: 在炒作列車到來前分析熱點股

previous.title:
Krispy Kreme giving away free donuts to vaccinated Americans

The irony

localize.full_text:
Krispy Kreme向接种疫苗的美国人免费赠送甜甜圈。

讽刺的是

Krispy Kreme向接種疫苗的美國人免費贈送甜甜圈。

諷刺的是

next.excerpt: Sonar.Network provides automatic daily website analysis. Analysis of more than 50 SEO errors, checking all website pages for CSS, JS, HTML validation. Payment for each site separately, the limit of 50,000 pages per site, daily checks, notifications.
next.title: Sonar Network - Automatic daily website analysis

localize.description: 声纳网提供每日自动网站分析。分析50多个SEO错误，检查所有网站页面的CSS、JS、HTML验证。每个网站单独付费，每个网站5万个页面的限制，每天检查，通知。
聲納網提供每日自動網站分析。分析50多個SEO錯誤，檢查所有網站頁面的CSS、JS、HTML驗證。每個網站單獨付費，每個網站5萬個頁面的限制，每天檢查，通知。
